sentence: Gonzalez, who announced his decision in November, was facing a primary challenge from Trump-backed Republican Max Miller.

title: Third Republican Who Voted To Impeach Trump Now Retiring

sentence: The six-term congressman from Amish Country exits a primary race in northeast Ohio that, under new temporary maps, would have put him up against Trump-backed Republican Max Miller.
author: JULIE CARR SMYTH - Associated Press
title: Ohio Rep. Bob Gibbs retires abruptly, blames fight over maps

title: Ohio Republican announces retirement over redistricting
